name: contingency_property_investigation_exceptions_waived_text
title: What property investigation contingencies will be waived?
label: Investigation Exceptions
description: Please list the items you'd like to waive.
tips: Be specific about which investigation components you're waiving. Clear documentation helps prevent misunderstandings.
small_print: By waiving the inspection contingency, you will have to acknowledge that you are accepting the property in its existing condition, without any warranties or guarantees from the Seller. You will be releasing the Seller from any liability for defects, damages, or other issues that may be discovered in the property after the closing date, including those related to any undisclosed issues or those that would have been discovered during an inspection.
